Don't miss out on NCS
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for telling us you're interested in NCS. We are The Challenge and we run NCS in your area. We’ve tried to contact you but haven't managed to speak to you yet. So, here's a taster of what NCS is about…
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEpX7Q2-CVQ
NCS is a life-changing experience for 15 - 17 year olds*. It is an opportunity for you to try new activities, make new friends and build the skills and confidence to help you in the future. Plus it’ll cost you no more than a £50 admin fee.
Sign up now: To kick-start your application, click sign up and login with: Your NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c} Your young person password: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
Your parent or guardian will need to fill in the main part of your application so please ask them to do this. If you’re not sure who can complete your application form, please check our website.
It’s quicker to apply online but if you would like a paper application form, please contact us using the details below.
Any questions? You may find your answer in our FAQs. Or, feel free to get in touch by using the details below.*
Over 200,000 young people have already taken part - don't miss your chance and sign up now for £50 or less!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
* Check to see if you’re eligible here * Financial support available when applying
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
